dk.itst.oiosaml.security
Class CredentialRepository

java.lang.Object
  dk.itst.oiosaml.security.CredentialRepository

public class CredentialRepository
extends Object

Class for managing credentials. Credentials can be loaded from the file system. When loaded, credentials are cached, so they are only loaded once. This class is thread-safe, and can be shared across threads.

Author:
recht

Method Detail

getCredential

public org.opensaml.xml.security.x509.BasicX509Credential getCredential(String location,
                                                                        String password)
Load credentials from a keystore. The first private key is loaded from the keystore.

Parameters:
location - keystore file location
password - Keystore and private key password.

getCredentials

public Collection<org.opensaml.xml.security.x509.BasicX509Credential> getCredentials()

createCredential

public static org.opensaml.xml.security.x509.BasicX509Credential createCredential(InputStream input,
                                                                                  String password)
Read credentials from a inputstream. The stream can either point to a PKCS12 keystore or a JKS keystore. The store is converted into a Credential including the private key.

Parameters:
input - Stream pointing to the certificate store.
password - Password for the store. The same password is also used for the certificate.
Returns:
The Credential

getCertificate

public X509Certificate getCertificate(String location,
                                      String password,
                                      String alias)
Get a x509certificate from a keystore.

Parameters:
location - Keystore file location.
password - Password for the keystore.
alias - Alias to retrieve. If null, the first certificate in the keystore is retrieved.
Returns:
The certificate.
